com.fizzikgames.fizlib.math

Class SquareMatrix2f

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fizzikgames.fizlib.math.SquareMatrix2f

  • public class SquareMatrix2f
extends java.lang.Object
    2x2 Matrix that can be used to apply linear transformations to 2D vectors or 2x2 Matrices representing a set of 2D vectors in the subspace R ^ 2.
    Version:
    1.00
    Author:
    Maxim Tiourin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.math.RoundingMode ROUNDING_MODE 
      static int ROUNDING_SCALE 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SquareMatrix2f()
      Creates a 2x2 identity matrix
      SquareMatrix2f(float a, float b, float c, float d)
      Creates a 2x2 matrix with the given values
      SquareMatrix2f(Vector2f col1, Vector2f col2)
      Creates a 2x2 matrix with the given column vectors

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float a()
      Returns the 'a' component of the 2x2 matrix.
      SquareMatrix2f applyTransform(SquareMatrix2f m)
      Returns the matrix attained from applying this linear transformation to a given matrix.
      Vector2f applyTransform(Vector2f v)
      Returns the vector attained from applying this linear transformation to a given vector.
      static SquareMatrix2f axisReflectionMatrix(boolean xAxis, boolean yAxis)
      Returns the standard reflection matrix for a linear transformation that reflects through either the xAxis, yAxis, or both(origin).
      float b()
      Returns the 'b' component of the 2x2 matrix.
      float c()
      Returns the 'c' component of the 2x2 matrix.
      SquareMatrix2f copy()
      Returns a copy of this matrix.
      float d()
      Returns the 'd' component of the 2x2 matrix.
      float determinant()
      Returns the determinant of the matrix
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o) 
      SquareMatrix2f inverse()
      Returns the inverse of the matrix
      static SquareMatrix2f multiply(SquareMatrix2f m1, SquareMatrix2f m2)
      Returns the 2x2 matrix result of multiplying a given 2x2 matrix by another given 2x2 matrix.
      static Vector2f multiply(SquareMatrix2f m, Vector2f v)
      Returns the vector result of multiplying a given 2x2 matrix by a given vector.
      static SquareMatrix2f rotationMatrix(double theta)
      Returns the standard rotation matrix for a linear transformation that rotates by the given angle in radians counter-clockwise.
      static SquareMatrix2f scaleMatrix(float xScale, float yScale)
      Returns the standard scale matrix for a linear transformation that contracts and expands by given scalars across the x and y axis.
      static SquareMatrix2f shearMatrix(float xShear, float yShear)
      Returns the standard shear matrix for a linear transformation that shears by the given amount in the x and y axis.
      java.lang.String toString() 
      SquareMatrix2f transpose()
      Returns the transpose of the matrix
      Vector2f v1()
      Returns the first column of the matrix as a vector2f.
      Vector2f v2()
      Returns the second column of the matrix as a vector2f.
